divs: Sighting DetailsBlue chevron shaped UFO hovering above, when I took my camera out to video tape it, it disappeared and then reappeared in another part of the eastern sky a little bit more east, it began to fall from the horizon and then just disappeared
Summary: Black chevron shaped UFO w/ blue lights on Flushing Main St
